Auston spent last season with one of the busiest jobs in [...]

articles.description: As you and I speculated in yesterday’s blog: “after a run of difficult group stage draws, we expect Celtic to get a favourable Champions League draw this evening”.  More of us will find out later today, optimism is well placed when you are a Celtic fan.  For Celtic in the Champions League, it is all [...]

Iwata, who had been named J-League Player of the Year when he [...]

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: LISBON LION Bobby Lennox, Celtic’s all-time second-highest goalscorer following two spells and 20 years at the club, celebrates his 81st birthday today. The striking speedster was born on this date in Saltcoats in 1943 – making him the Lisbon Lion born furthest from Parkhead. Lennox joined the Hoops from Junior side Ardeer Recreation in 1961 [...]
